snippet: Officials said Ralph L. Godbee Jr. had decided to step down after news emerged last week that he was having an affair with an internal affairs officer in the department.
abstract: Detroit Police Chief Ralph L Godbee Jr resigns amid allegations that he is having an affair with Angelica Robinson, an internal affairs officer in the department.
lead_paragraph: Officials said Ralph L. Godbee Jr. had decided to step down after news emerged last week that he was having an affair with an internal affairs officer in the department.

headline.seo: Detroit Police Chief Forced to Resign Amid Sex Scandal
